content.rendered:
Salary: $25-30/hr+

Location: 100% Remote but must have residency in CT, GA, MA, NM or RI

Job Description:
– Seeking an acute care Outpatient Coder with at least 2 years of relevant experience
– Responsible for collecting, coding and recording accurate and complete patient care data from Outpatient facility records
– Working knowledge of and ability to resolve NCCI, MUE & Medical Necessity Edits
– Employer desires a self-starter with a strong sense of ownership and the ability to work independently
– Position will report to the HIM Manager

Requirements:
– RHIA, RHIT, CCS, COC or CCA required
– Experience in Meditech and Cerner a plus
– 3M experience desired
– Must live in Connecticut, Georgia, Massachusetts, New Mexico or Rhode Island

Benefits:
– Employer desires to move quickly in making a hiring decision once the right candidate is identified!
– Full-time, full-benefit, long-term and stable opportunity working directly for a health system
– 100% Remote
– $25-30/hr+

meta._job_location: 100% Remote; must live in CT, GA, MA, NM or RI
